hero.first: In this project we want to represent 3d model extracted from IFC files.
hero.second: All the files are stored in a graph database: ArangoDB.
hero.third: If you want to map IFC files in ArangoDB or watch a fire simulation, go in the navbar section Data Management.

body.toolbarInstructions: This simple suite allows you to render models from an IFC file, and navigate around them. The toolbar located at the bottom has two functions, the first button allows you to load a file with .ifc format, the second allows you to remove the inserted models.
body.leftMouse: • While holding LEFT mouse button you can rotate around a point in the scene
body.rightMouse: • While holding RIGHT mouse button you can move through the axes in the scene.

page-not-found.title: Error 404!
page-not-found.subtitle: Page not found
page-not-found.text: We apologize, the page you were looking for does not exist or it's temporarily unavailable.
